response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its significance to you, valued at $10,000, and we're eager to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. Therefore, we propose a purchase price of $11,500. This offer not only ensures you receive a high-quality product but also allows us to achieve a fair return for our investment. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any other way we can assist you.", "product_price": 11500}
